segments.text: Hi , Steven ! What do you like to do during the weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I love swimming and cycling . On Saturday morning I usually ride my bike around the city or the country road for almost two hours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s great ! I think they do you a lot of good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But why do you choose cycling at first ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because it is convenient and good for environmental protection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are really a good citizen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s what I can do .
segments.speaker: S2
